hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Sa`id Al-Khudri and Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "No fatigue, nor disease, nor sorrow, nor sadness, nor hurt, nor distress befalls a Muslim, even if it were the prick he receives from a thorn, but that Allah expiates some of his sins for that

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ مَا جَاءَ فِي كَفَّارَةِ الْمَرَضِ
